description:
Toudou Saburouta was one of the Exorcists sent out to retrieve back the Left Eye of the Impure King.
While he and the rest of the team chased after the culprit, the culprit managed to take a little boy as a hostage, confining himself in a building afterwards. http://anidb.net/ch25809 [Yukio] arrived at the scene, accompanied with http://anidb.net/ch25822 [Shura] and http://anidb.net/ch25808 [Rin], and was briefed by Toudou about what happened. They put on a protective suits and entered the building.
After that, it was revealed that the Left Eye of the Impure King was actually the fake and that Toudou already had it and was possessed by a demon.
Sometime later, he was assisted by http://anidb.net/ch85283 [Houjou Mamushi] in stealing the Right Eye of the Impure King and, with that achieved, breaking the seal put on the Impure King and releasing him afterwards.
name: Toudou Saburouta
